Patients or Families in Need A) Patients with advanced liver diseases, such as cirrhosis, liver cancer, or acute liver failure, who have been advised or are considering a liver transplant. C) Children and adults who may be seeking guidance for liver-related disorders or second opinions. 2. Insurance and Medical Financing Agencies Professionals or organizations that support patients in navigating the costs and logistics of liver transplantation. 5.
